org.deeplearning4j.iterator.provider

Class CollectionLabeledSentenceProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.iterator.provider.CollectionLabeledSentenceProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LabeledSentenceProvider

    public class CollectionLabeledSentenceProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements LabeledSentenceProvider
    Iterate over a set of sentences/documents, where the sentences and labels are provided in lists.

    • Constructor Summary

      java.util.List<java.lang.String> allLabels()

      Are there more sentences/documents available?

      Equivalent to allLabels().size()
